steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Season cubed chicken lightly with salt and pepper (go light on salt since soy sauce adds sodium)
Add chicken to hot skillet and cook without stirring for 3-4 minutes to brown one side
While chicken browns, whisk together honey, soy sauce, minced garlic, and red pepper flakes (if using) in a small bowl
Flip chicken pieces and immediately add the honey garlic sauce to the pan
Toss chicken to coat evenly in sauce and cook 4-5 more minutes until chicken is fully cooked through (internal temperature 165Â°F)
Serve immediately over steamed rice with desired toppings
title: Honey Garlic Chicken
